attributes.action: Tougher sentences for Pedofiles, Rapists and those who abduct Innocent Children for the own sick sexual desires and Child Murders.
attributes.additional_details: Pedofiless, rapists, sex dungeons and child abduction and child abuse, children being snatched and killed or used for sickos weird sexual desires. Time for harsher sentences for these sick perverts they cost this country thousands if not millions of Great British Pounds to be housed at her majestys pleasure, i say enough is enough the only sentence these perverts deserve is the Death Sentence.
